summary:
overhaul version of \"Enhanced Vanilla Skyrim ENB\"

uses now also SweetFX and no FXAA presets....
descriptionHtml:
Readme; 

1. SweetFX Enhanced Vanilla Skyrim gets no other updates thats already the Final Version (maybe i upload someday a Performence patch for it like Delusional)

2. Enhanced Vanilla Skyrim ENB gets hide by now after uploading this one.

--------------------

What do you need;

1. Download [url=http://www.enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0139.htm]ENBSeries v0.139[/url] (older version i dont recomment!)
2. Download [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17802]Project Reality - Climates Of Tamriel - Weather - Lighting[/url] 

-----------------------

How to config;

1. Shift+Enter is your ENB Customizer (a GUI)
2. Scroll_Lock key is enable SweetFX (if you cant disable it well normally when you Start game the ENB and SweetFX start automally)
3. Shift+F12 is enabling the ENB (if you cant because of Steam, then change screenshot button via steam....)

----------------------

rest of all..... You got like always, all permissions of that mod to adjust your own values of that ENB-SweetFX and you can upload them also (credid me)


---------

Credits goes to;

Bethesda Softwork - skyrim itself (lol)
Boris Vorontsov - ENBseries
CeeJay - SweetFX creator 


----
Edit: This my Last ENb Mod im gonna upload forever, there coming no new ones, i just adjust the setting of them sometimes when i got more time, plus my next goal is getting better quests to work, i try to continue sword of the septim quest little better

thanks.
author: bardockssj
